name: Oboz Sawtooth II 8" Insulated B-Dry Winter Boots - Men's
categories: Sawtooth II 8" Insulated B-Dry Winter Boots
description: Hut trip rest days, snowshoe tracks, or slippery sidewalks, the insulated version of the ever-loved Sawtooth provides warmth and weather protection for outdoor winter experiences. Aggressive lugs keep you upright on slippery surfaces and insulation and a fleece collar keep your feet toasty.Suede leather and abrasion-resistant mesh balance protection and breathability.Oboz BDry waterproof-breathable membrane.200g 3M Thinsulate synthetic insulation.Fleece-lined collar articulates with the ankle for comfort.Rubber heel counter adds protection and stability.O-Fit insole has multi-density cushioning EVA podsEVA midsole provides cushioning and support and a nylon shank adds stability.Sawtooth winterized rubber in a high-friction compound for durable traction.
